number.description: Unique number assigned by SK credit note number schema. Auto-assigned when document is opened. Required unless doc status is draft.

address_field.description: Address field with the receiver. Shown in envelope window.

date.description: Date the credit note is issued. Automatically set when document is opened. Required unless doc status is draft.

due_days.description: Used to calculate the due date of the credit note. Useless if date and due date are present.

due_date.description: Auto-calculated from date + due days if empty and the document is opened.

status.description: Defaults to draft for new documents, unless otherwise stated. For new documents with status 'open', following fields are set if empty: number(next in number schema), date(today), due date(due_days must be given). Only draft invoices can be deleted.

payment_method.description: How the document is beeing payed. Used in new payments.

title.description: The headline of a document. Use SK placeholders to prevent exessive typing e.g. 'Your credit note [number]'

notes_before.description: Notes shown before the line items. Normaly contains salutation and other introductional information. SK placeholders can be used.

notes_after.description: Notes shown after the line items. Can contain information about payments, bank account or a thank-you message. SK placeholders can be used.

client.description: The client for the document. New documents cannot create a client, use client_id field to set it.

client_id.description: The clients uuid, must be set for a new document. New documents take the clients address field, due days and cash discount if those fields are not set.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards.

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

lock_version.description: Auto-incremented by SK to prevent concurrent updateing. First save wins.

gross_total.description: Gross total of all line items, 2 decimals places

net_total_base.description: Net total, decimals places as set in precision, default 2

net_total_base_raw.description: Net total, 6 decimal places. Summmed items net_total_base_raw (incl discount)
